item.title: Error
item.dc:creator: @stormcutter stormcutter
item.description:
@stormcutter wrote:

k i add commands everyday but suddenly today when i tried to add these commands they dotn work! they keep giving error. (i got from tut section)

if (command.startsWith(“jail”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
if(teleblock == true){
sendMessage(“A magical force stops you from teleporting.”); //made by vic 08
}
String name = command.substring(5);
client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(name)];
c.teleportToX = 2451;
c.teleportToY = 4938;
c.teleblock = true;
c.sendMessage(“You have been thrown in jail for breaking the rules!”);
c.sendMessage(“A mod or Admin will release you if they feel like it!”);
c.teleblock = true;
updateRequired = true;
appearanceUpdateRequired = true; }

if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“privacy”) && (playerRights == 3))
{
try {

		server.clientListener.close();

	} catch(IOException e) {

		sendMessage("Error with making the server private!");
	}

		}

I add the } in neccesary places but still wont work. Atleast tell me how to fix privacy one thats more pimportant[br][br][size=1]Posted on: March 10, 2008, 03:33:54 PM[/size][hr]plz
